definitions.definition: Complete cessation of suffering ; a blissful state attained through realization of sunyata ; enlightened experience .
State of paradise ; heightened or great pleasure or peace .

main_definition: ( Buddhism ) Complete cessation of suffering ; a blissful state attained through realization of sunyata ; enlightened experience .
secondary_definitions: ( non-Buddhist , colloquial ) State of paradise ; heightened or great pleasure or peace .
